description:
A pocket sharpener for your pocketknife, or really anything with an edge. With 2 sides of diamond composite grit, the EdgeTek Dual can touch up worn edges or re-edge dull edges.

  • Diamond grit works well on softer metals and heat-treated tool steels
  • Grit levels: 325 coarse and 750 medium
name: Buck EdgeTek Dual Pocket Stone Diamond Sharpener - Dual Grit
